title: Registration required; exceptions
context: PART IV. REGISTRATION AND ADMINISTRATION OF CONDOMINIUMS Note Part heading amended by L 2005, c 93, pt of ยง3. [ยง514B-51] Registration required; exceptions. (a) A developer may not offer for sale any units in a project unless the project is registered with the commission and an effective date for the developer&rsquo;s public report is issued by the commission. (b) The registration requirement of this section shall not apply to: (1) The disposition of units exempted from the developer&rsquo;s public report requirements pursuant to section 514B-81(b); (2) Projects in which all units are restricted to nonresidential uses and all units are to be sold for $1,000,000 or more; or (3) The sale of units in bulk, such as where a developer undertakes to develop and then sells all or a portion of the developer&rsquo;s entire inventory of units to a purchaser who is a developer. The registration requirements of this section and the developer&rsquo;s amended developer&rsquo;s public report requirements of section 514B-56 shall apply to any sale of units to the public following a sale of units in bulk. [L 2005, c 93, pt of ยง3]
